title: Implement frontend insights and responsive behavior
description: Implement the insights view consuming summary API data and ensure mobile/desktop usability, accessibility labeling, and complete loading/empty/error states for data surfaces.
acceptance_criteria: Insights view shows total spend and per-category breakdown for selected date range.
Expense and insights flows are usable on mobile and desktop widths.
All forms and interactive controls are keyboard accessible with visible labels.
Each data view presents explicit loading, empty, and error UI states.
